The study enrol healthy participant ( Part I ) migraine patient ( Part III ) . Due protocol amendment , study Part II conduct .
DOC.brief_title: Positron Emission Tomography ( PET ) Study Brain Calcitonin Gene-Related Peptide ( CGRP ) Receptor Occupancy After Telcagepant Administration ( MK-0974-067 )
DOC.detailed_description: For 1120 mg ( i.e. , maximal ) telcagepant dose , [ 11C ] MK-4232 administer PET scan start ~3 hour post telcagepant coincide Tmax 1120 mg dose . For 140 mg ( i.e. , therapeutic ) telcagepant dose , [ 11C ] MK-4232 administer PET scan start ~2 hour post telcagepant correspond time clinical efficacy measurement telcagepant migraine treatment Phase III study .
